Name: Army Men
About the game: Every conquering army needs a great leader. Even the plastic ones! Take control as the sergeant in the field, leading your men into the heat of battle in this tactical action game. 28 action-packed mission in three different terrains. Drive tanks, jeeps, half-tracks, and cargo trucks. Devastate your opponents with deadly airstrikes, paratroop drops, and air reconnaissance. Tons of destructive weapons at your disposal including cannons, machine guns, grenades, and bazookas.
